hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: You thought it would be a useful hint, but it was me, Junk Hint!

HC (Malon).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Spirit Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Oh!^Oh-oh!^C'mon!^Come on! Come on! Come on!^HOT!!^What a hot beat!^WHOOOOAH!^YEEEEAH!^YAHOOO!!

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# and #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Basement Silver Rupee Ladders Bottom

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Water Temple Compass#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #4# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Tower#.
